item.title: Self-host RSS
item.description: Edit: According to Miniflux’s documentation, refreshing feeds is not possible with Reeder since no user information is sent. This means, I can only fetch something new when the server side refreshes (by default, it’s once an hour), no matter what syncing frequency I set in the application. That’s definitely a bummer. But I will keep an eye on this. Maybe it will eventually become a turning point when I finally quit information overdosing.
